description: A soft, comfortable fleece liner with touch function. Perfect as a thin glove for running, hiking and other outdoor activities in spring and autumn. In the winter it works as a reinforcing layer inside a thicker glove in colder temperatures. Sewn in flexible polyester fleece with conductive grip coating on the index finger that lets you use a smartphone and other touchscreens without taking the glove off.
name: Touch Point Fleece Liners
